name: cleanread
description: Chrome extension to make webpages more readable for people with dyslexia

scripts.copy-assets: npm run copy-manifest && npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css && npm run copy-content && npm run copy-icons && npm run copy-js-files
scripts.copy-html: xcopy popup.html dist\ /Y && xcopy options.html dist\ /Y
scripts.copy-css: xcopy popup.css dist\ /Y && xcopy options.css dist\ /Y
scripts.copy-content: xcopy src\content\ dist\content\ /E /I /Y && xcopy src\shared\ dist\shared\ /E /I /Y && xcopy src\shared\ dist\content\shared\ /E /I /Y
scripts.copy-icons: if not exist dist\icons mkdir dist\icons && xcopy src\icons\icon_16.png dist\icons\ /Y && xcopy src\icons\icon_48.png dist\icons\ /Y && xcopy src\icons\icon_128.png dist\icons\ /Y
scripts.copy-js-files: xcopy src\background\background.js dist\ /Y && xcopy src\content\content.js dist\ /Y && xcopy src\content\content_loader.js dist\ /Y && xcopy src\popup\popup.js dist\ /Y && xcopy src\options\options.js dist\ /Y
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && powershell Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath ..\cleanread-extension.zip

author: CleanRead Team
